thread.title: BRIEF-Kura Oncology Inc - Co Entered Into An Amended And Restated Sales Agreement With Cowen And Company​

title: BRIEF-Kura Oncology Inc - Co Entered Into An Amended And Restated Sales Agreement With Cowen And Company​
text: March 12, 2018 / 8:51 PM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-Kura Oncology Inc - Co Entered Into An Amended And Restated Sales Agreement With Cowen And Company​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 12 (Reuters) - Kura Oncology Inc: * KURA ONCOLOGY INC - ‍ON MARCH 12, 2018, CO ENTERED INTO AN AMENDED AND RESTATED SALES AGREEMENT WITH COWEN AND COMPANY, LLC - SEC FILING​ * KURA ONCOLOGY-INCREASED MAXIMUM AGGREGATE OFFERING PRICE OF SHARES OF CO'S COMMON STOCK, THAT IS CO MAY OFFER AND SELL FROM $100.0 MILLION TO $160.0 MILLION​ Source text ( bit.ly/2HrCHZZ ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
